clean_data: Oracle Database Administrator Oracle span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan Oracle Database Administrator Resultsdriven IT personnel with skills in team building and problemsolving with an established reputation for effectively working with diverse groups of people and adaptability to changing environments Proficient in Oracle 11g and 12c Database Administration SQLplus experience in Rac ASM RMAN backup and recovery Over 5 years of Oracle database experience Very passionate on improving Oracle related systems for better ease of use along with speeding up queries Work Experience Oracle Database Administrator Fitzgerald Inc March 2014 to March 2017 Troubleshoot and resolve various Oracle connectivity problems Documented database structure changes problems issues for future reference Managing Undo Tablespaces Redo Logs Control files and Archive logs Performing database cloning and duplication using RMANManaging Schema Objects Administer database user accounts Create modify and deactivate user accounts assign and monitor user access rights Create and manage documentation on the configuration and support of the Oracle databases Perform bulk load into the database using SQL Implemented multiplexing control files and redo log files Performed incremental backups using RMAN Provide database administration on production testing and development database servers Use explain plan AWR ADDM and various Oracle Advisors to tune the database Education Computer Technology Montgomery College 2008 to 2010 Skills DATABASE 3 years DATABASES 3 years ORACLE 3 years RMAN 3 years DATABASE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM Less than 1 year Additional Information Skills Experience with administering and upgrading databases to Oracle 12c Expertise in diagnosing and resolving database performance issues Experience with running Oracle database on Virtual Machines VMWare Strong experience with installation upgrade and patching Oracle software and maintaining DBMS Software in an enterprise infrastructure setting Experience with RMAN OEM Grid Control RAC ASM and other Oracle features tools Ability to provide technical direction to others including application developers Monitor system by developing and maintaining monitoring scripts Provides training and guidance to peers and Database Administrators Clear and effective communicator both oral and written
